word: ELDER WHITE.--THEN AT ONE TIME I REMEMBER VERY DISTINCTLY ABOUT YOUR SAYING, THAT "AS WE APPROACH NEARER THE END, I HAVE SEEN OUR CAMP-MEETINGS WITH LESS PREACHING AND MORE BIBLE STUDY; LITTLE GROUPS ALL OVER THE GROUND WITH THEIR BIBLES IN THEIR HANDS, AND DIFFERENT ONES LEADING OUT IN A FREE CONVERSATIONAL STUDY OF THE SCRIPTURES."
